Title: Maximum Xor Subarray
Description: Given an array of n integers, your task is to find the maximum xor sum in a subarray.
Input Specification:
The first input line has an integer n: the size of the array. 
 The next line has n integers x_1,x_2,\dots,x_n: the contents of the array.
Output Specification: Print one integer: the maximum xor sum in a subarray.
